title: Book Store App
description: User is creating a web app with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Nodemailer for efficient, full-stack, scalable development.

title: News App
description: Create a React app, install Axios, and structure components for fetching and displaying news from the News API.

title: Industrial App
description: Create a Node.js web app using Express, Handlebars for templating, and Nodemailer for email handling. Install dependencies, configure, and build.

title: Chat App
description: Build a Node.js chat app using Socket.io by setting up the server, creating endpoints, and handling real-time messaging.

title: Background Changer
description: creating a background app using Reactjs library and bootstrap package.

title: My Portfolio
description: creating a Animated Portfolio website using Reactjs

title: CRUD App
description: Set up a MERN stack CRUD app by initializing the project, setting up the backend with Express and MongoDB, and creating routes.
